function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Skepticism surrounding the validity and transparency of existing donation platforms","Impact":"Decreased citizen participation in monetary donations","Mitigation":"Implementation of a secure and transparent donation platform, public disclosure of fund utilization","Technologies":"Blockchain-based crowdfunding platforms","People":"Citizens, donors, charitable organizations","Owner":"Charitable organizations, fundraising platforms"},{"Description":"Supply chain disruptions due to COVID-19 and trade restrictions","Impact":"Halted production, delayed transport of goods, difficulties in maintaining flow of goods and services","Mitigation":"Incorporation of blockchain technology in supply chains, increase in supply chain visibility","Technologies":"Blockchain","People":"International trade organizations, suppliers, logistic partners","Owner":"International trade organizations, supply chain management organizations"}]}
